builds.name: Barbarian
builds.desc: This build focuses on raw power, heavy armor, and devastating two-handed weapon strikes, fitting the strengths of both Nords and Orcs.

builds.name: Spellsword
builds.desc: A balanced mix of magic and melee that both High Elves and Orcs can use effectively, with High Elves leaning toward magic and Orcs toward melee.

builds.name: Warrior
builds.desc: focusing on strength, durability, and powerful melee combat, allowing you to charge into battle and overpower your enemies with sheer force.

builds.name: Stealth Mage
builds.desc: Approach enemies unseen, using stealth to deliver deadly one-handed sneak attacks, then fall back to destruction magic to eliminate the rest.

skills.name: Two-Handed
skills.desc: Focus on maximizing damage with large, heavy weapons like battleaxes, warhammers, and greatswords.

skills.name: Heavy Armor
skills.desc: Helps to absorb damage in battle, perfect for melee combat.

skills.name: Block
skills.desc: Blocking with a weapon or shield can reduce damage taken.

skills.name: Smithing
skills.desc: Crafting and upgrading your own weapons and armor are essential for a warrior.

skills.name: Enchanting
skills.desc: Enchanting your weapons and armor with stamina regeneration, health boosts, or extra damage can enhance your attack.

skills.name: Archery
skills.desc: Useful for taking out enemies at a distance before charging into combat.

skills.name: Sneak
skills.desc: Incredibly versatile, allowing you to steal, deliver devastating blows, or avoid confrontation.

skills.name: One-Handed
skills.desc: Perform power attacks with one-handed weapons like swords, axes, and maces, making it essential for fast and versatile melee combat.

skills.name: Destruction
skills.desc: Focus on Destruction for offensive magic, especially fire, frost, or shock spells.

skills.name: Restoration
skills.desc: focus on Restoration for healing and wards. You can heal yourself during battle while fighting.

skills.name: Light Armor
skills.desc: Ideal for thieves, assassins, archers, and mages who want to stay mobile.

skills.name: Illusion
skills.desc: Manipulate the minds of enemies through spells like Calm, Fear, and Invisibility, making it ideal for stealth, crowd control, and avoiding direct combat.

skills.name: Alchemy
skills.desc: Create potions to enhance your stealth or poisons to weaken enemies before engaging in combat.

skills.name: Alteration
skills.desc: Enhances your ability to alter the physical world with spells like Oakflesh, Paralyze, and Telekinesis, providing powerful defensive buffs, crowd control, and utility in various situations.
